title: @Question to Meddler or Designer who work on Assasins update - Evelynn - why not revert some nerfs ?
body:
I know she got small buff (CDR) on ultimate  but 

If may I ask about WHY :

1) It would be so bad to revert last DMG nerfs on Q ? (or speed projectiles ? ) . I Main evelynn from the start. She struggles now to clear jungle . So Why not buff her Q again ?

2)There is no DFG anymore in game . (we all remm. DFG) . What about reverting her "E" spell to Magic DMG ? Now it deals Physical one

3) Why not revert her R nerf . Make it % from MAX health not current health. So she can kill someone even from 1 HP


Like i said im not designer . Im followin current meta and she has alot problems  If I could get some asnwers on that would be nice


Idea Part about her W:

What if she could lower CD on W for each AUTO-atack she gonna make on enemy champion . It would be kinda Trade-off. You want be more slippery make more auto atacks



Small discussion . Summoners / Designers ?

replies.body: I'll be happy as soon as they make her E magic damage again. Still salty about that.
